'''Tear Down This Wall!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to destroy an [[Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl]]'s shield.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the {{w|Tear down this wall!|Berlin Wall Speech}}, during which US President {{w|Ronald Reagan}} said, "Mr. Gorbachev, tear down this wall!"
* The German localization "Die Mauer muss weg!" was a slogan or chant during the time and the fall of the Berlin Wall.
